ux-researcher.title: UX Researcher
description: Manage and conduct user research and concept development
Research and investigate user persona & their behavior
Collaborate with other teams to define and implement solutions for the software direction, visuals, and experience
Review & iterate product functions by collaborating with product engineers
Create product design (flow, mockup, prototyping, etc) and product development plan
requirement: Vocational / Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related major
Experienced in handling at least 2 projects with a similar role
Strong knowledge on Design Sprint, Scrum & PDLC
Experience with conducting user research
Have the ability to design UI websites & apps using prototype tools (Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, Marvel, etc)
Able to communicate clearly, both oral and written
Able to work in a team
Have a personal laptop
Willing to be placed in the Waste4Change Semarang Office
Have experiences regarding user research, prototyping, design sprint & communication

product-ui-ux-designer.title: Product UI/UX Designer
description: Create product design UI & Flow
Collaborate with other teams to define and implement solutions for the software direction, visuals, and experience
Execute design stages from concept to final hand-off to the engineering team
Review, test, & iterate product functions by collaborating with product engineers
requirement: A minimum of 1-year experience
Max 30 years old
Good understanding of product design process (Design Thinking, User Story, Product Requirement, etc)
Have knowledge regarding UI UX Design, excellent visual design skills with sensitivity to user-system interaction

fullstack-wordpress-web-engineer.title: Fullstack & Wordpress Web Engineer
description: Create system design and product development plan
Build a reliable product from scratch & WordPress environment
Manage system infrastructure
requirement: A minimum of 1-year experience
Understand web development using JS, CSS, HTML, Ajax, PHP using framework (Laravel, CI, WordPress)
Possess good knowledge about Event-Driven Protocols (REST API, Webhook, Websocket, etc)
Proficiency with Git & Composer
Able to work with the product development team
Have good leadership and work attitude
Stay up to date with the industry development and have a good learning spirit

hse-officer.title: HSE Officer
description: Formulate and analyze the improvement of Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) management standard
Give internal training and education to employees regarding Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) management standard
Formulate programs related to Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) management standard
Conduct an audit regarding Occupational Health and Safety (OHS) aspects in work areas
Make reports regarding the results of data analysis towards Occupation Health and Safety (OHS)
requirement: Min. Vocational/Bachelor Degree in Public Health/Environmental Engineering/ Hiperkes (K3)
Have a certificate in general Occupational Health and Safety (OHS)
Male / Female max 30 years old
Candidates who are based in either Bekasi/Jakarta will be prioritized
Have a personal laptop

surveyor.title: Surveyor
description: Conduct on-ground sampling three days a week
Input data daily
Conduct composition sampling
Coordinate with the surveyor manager regarding technical matters and also for reporting
requirement: Final Year Student from Environmental/Marine Engineering
Proficient in operating Ms. Excel and Ms. Powerpoint
Have a private vehicle, since the job will require you to move from one location to another
Have a personal laptop
Honest and responsible for the sampling data

po-tetrapak.title: PO Tetrapak
description: Be in charge of Tetrapak's project pertaining to Collection
Coordinate with existing partners
Formulate work plan with the Strategic Services division
Capable of fulfilling the designated target
Make sure and oversee that the shipment and transportation of the Used Beverage Cartons (UBC) went well
Make monthly report
requirement: At least a Bachelor's Degree, preferred from Social Sciences
Experienced in leading a team
Have a personal laptop and is proficient with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, dan PowerPoint)
Preferred candidates with extensive knowledge in recycling
Good negotiation and communication skill

collect-supervisor.title: Collect Supervisor
description: Plan and execute the flow of the transport system management services
Increase both the efficiency and effectivity relating to transport services flow
Control and supervise the performance of each personnel relating to the activities
requirement: Male, max. 35 years old
At least a Bachelor's Degree, preferred from Logistic Management
Preferred candidates with work experience in the logistic division
Experienced in leading a team
Good communication skill

recruiter.title: Recruiter
description: Manage and develop human resources, including to plan, execute, and supervise the company's human resources as well as to develop and improve the quality of the human resources
Be in charge of the company's needs for new employees
Conduct and supervise recruitment process, starting from the selection process up to the contract signing
Formulate recruitment strategy as well as evaluate the existing recruitment process
Conduct networking with relevant stakeholders who will be able to provide references in recruiting new employees such as the Labor Agency, educational institution, as well as public figures
requirement: Male / Female max. 30 years old
Bachelor Degree from Psychology/ HR Management
Have experience as a Recruiter for at least 2 years
Capable of using measuring instrument in the selection process of a potential employee
Good communication and negotiation skill
Candidates with at least 1 HR Certification (Recruitment and Selection) are more preferred
English proficiency, especially in reading and writing
Have a personal laptop
Will be placed in Bekasi

innovation-officer.title: Innovation Officer
description: Female/Male max.35 years old
At least a Bachelor's Degree from Environmental Engineering
Proficient in English
Good analytic and problem-solving skills
Have a personal laptop and is able to operate it well
requirement: Coordinate with external parties who are intending to cooperate with the company in regards to the procurement of services and goods for research and development purposes
Perform analysis and develop the company's service line
Develop the quality of the product/services that the company provide

office-administration-and-procurement-of.title: Office Administration and Procurement Officer
description: Create a procurement system and procedure
Execute goods purchasing procedure
Actively looking for and updating the supplier contact data
Negotiate and evaluate suppliers
Perform daily administration tasks
Manage purchase request from all departments
Perform asset recording system

Have at least 2 years of experience in the same field or in administration/purchasing / GA
Proficient in English, both written and spoken
Discipline, thorough, and is responsible
Highly initiative
Good communication, negotiation, presentation, and interpersonal skills
Have leadership skills and able to work in a team
Have a personal laptop

customer-service.title: Customer Service
description: At least a High School/Vocational School graduate (Social or Tourism major preferred)
Candidates with previous exprience in a similar field are more preferred
Good communication and interpersonal skills
Candidates with English proficiency (at least written) are preffered
Honest, tenacious, and is responsible
Able to operate Windows Microsoft Office
Able to work under pressure
Have a personal laptop
requirement: Respond to every customer's inquiry
Help address the issues that are experienced by the customers
Record and archive every interaction. transcation, comment, and complaint with and from customers
Good communication, negotiation, presentation, and interpersonal skills,Give feedback regarding the customer service process and eficiency
Ensure customers' satisfaction and provide professional customer support

enumerator.title: Enumerator
description: Interview respondents using the questionnare that has been provided
Perform coding based on the interview results
Deliver reports regarding the results of daily coding
Perform data cleaning whenever necessary
requirement: At least a Final Year or Fresh Graduate from Sociology/Anthropology
Candidates with previous experience as enumerator are preferred
Good communication skill
Have a private vehicle and a driving license (SIM C)
Have a personal laptop
Willing to be placed in Kedungwaringin, Bekasi
Willing to work between the period from 3rd August until 7th September 2020
